comment: This file in some cases has a very specific ordering.  For instance, the first instance of any used_by list
will also be the pose that is used to import the image.  For this reason, some poses will be out of order
and this is intentional because a pose might be mirrored in its first occurance (grapple), or perhaps
the way that it will be present in the ROM is different before and after modification (e.g. screw attack)

elevator.description: Used when wearing power suit and standing on an elevator

launcher.description: Used when wearing power suit and loading from a save point

elevator_varia.description: Used when wearing varia or gravity suit and standing on an elevator

launcher_varia.description: Used when wearing varia or gravity suit and loading from a save point

stand_left.description: A neutral standing pose, used while...standing

stand_left_heavy.description: While standing with low health, begins to breathe heavily

stand_right.description: A neutral standing pose, used while...standing

stand_right_heavy.description: While standing with low health, begins to breathe heavily

stand_left_aim_diag_up.description: Standing, but aiming diagonally upwards, or lifting the cannon further upwards

stand_right_aim_diag_up.description: Standing, but aiming diagonally upwards, or lifting the cannon further upwards

stand_turn_left_aim_up.description: While standing and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

stand_turn_neutral_aim_up.description: While standing and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

stand_turn_right_aim_up.description: While standing and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

stand_left_aim_diag_down.description: Standing, but aiming diagonally upwards, or lifting the cannon further upwards

stand_turn_left_aim_down.description: While standing and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

stand_turn_neutral_aim_down.description: While standing and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

stand_turn_right_aim_down.description: While standing and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_left.description: While crouching but not aiming, Samus breathes

crouch_left_heavy.description: While crouching with low health, begins to breathe heavily

crouch_right.description: While crouching but not aiming, Samus breathes

crouch_right_heavy.description: While crouching with low health, begins to breathe heavily

run_left_shooting.description: Running while firing the arm cannon, so that the arm is extended forward

run_right_shooting.description: Running while firing the arm cannon, so that the arm is extended forward

jump_left_start_spin_jump.description: As Samus begins to do a spinjump/spacejump/screwattack, this pose shows her transitioning off the ground before spinning

spin_jump_left_land.description: After a spin jump, Samus makes contact with the ground

grapple_wall_left.description: Samus is grappled to a wall on the right, preparing to jump out to the left

wall_jump_left.description: Samus when she is priming to jump leftwards off of a right wall

wall_jump_launch_left.description: Samus when she is beginning the jump leftwards off of a right wall

jump_right_start_spin_jump.description: As Samus begins to do a spinjump/spacejump/screwattack, this pose shows her transitioning off the ground before spinning

spin_jump_right_land.description: After a spin jump, Samus makes contact with the ground

grapple_wall_right.description: Samus is grappled to a wall on the left, preparing to jump out to the right

wall_jump_right.description: Samus when she is priming to jump rightwards off of a left wall

wall_jump_launch_right.description: Samus when she is beginning the jump rightwards off of a left wall

space_jump_left.description: Samus space jumping counterclockwise, or combined with sparks for screw attack

space_jump_right.description: Samus space jumping clockwise, or combined with sparks for screw attack

morphball_stand_left.description: When the morphball is not moving, it rotates through these poses

morphball_stand_right.description: When the morphball is not moving, it rotates through these poses

morphball_roll_left.description: When the morphball is rolling on the ground, it rotates through these poses

morphball_roll_right.description: When the morphball is rolling on the ground, it rotates through these poses

morphball_fall_left.description: When the morphball is either jumping or falling, it rotates through these poses

morphball_fall_right.description: When the morphball is either jumping or falling, it rotates through these poses

moonwalk_left.description: Samus is facing right, but walking backwards, i.e. walking left

moonwalk_right.description: Samus is facing left, but walking backwards, i.e. walking right

moonwalk_left_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is facing right, but walking backwards, and aiming diagonally up

moonwalk_right_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is facing left, but walking backwards, and aiming diagonally up

moonwalk_left_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is facing right, but walking backwards, and aiming diagonally down

moonwalk_right_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is facing left, but walking backwards, and aiming diagonally down

xray_crouch_left.description: While using the xray scope, a light cone appears from Samus's visor and she looks in the correct direction

xray_crouch_right.description: While using the xray scope, a light cone appears from Samus's visor and she looks in the correct direction

stand_turn_left.description: While standing, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

stand_turn_neutral.description: While standing, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

stand_turn_right.description: While standing, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_left.description: While crouching, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

crouch_turn_neutral.description: While crouching, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

crouch_turn_right.description: While crouching, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

jump_left_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump in a non-spin way, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_left.description: When Samus jumps up without spinning, or when she is starting a lateral shinespark

jump_left_land.description: while facing left, Samus makes contact with the ground after a regular jump or a fall

jump_right_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump in a non-spin way, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_right.description: When Samus jumps up without spinning, or when she is starting a lateral shinespark

jump_right_land.description: while facing right, Samus makes contact with the ground after a regular jump or a fall

jump_left_aim_up_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_left_aim_up.description: When Samus jumps and shoots upwards

jump_left_aim_up_land.description: while facing left and aiming up, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_right_aim_up_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_right_aim_up.description: When Samus jumps and shoots upwards

jump_right_aim_up_land.description: while facing right and aiming up, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_left_aim_diag_up_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming diagonally upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_left_aim_diag_up.description: When Samus jumps and shoots diagonally upwards

jump_left_aim_diag_up_land.description: while facing left and aiming diagonally up, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_right_aim_diag_up_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming diagonally upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_right_aim_diag_up.description: When Samus jumps and shoots diagonally upwards

jump_right_aim_diag_up_land.description: while facing right and aiming diagonally up, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_left_shoot_land.description: while facing left and shooting, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall.  Also used for falling out of crystal flash.

jump_right_shoot_land.description: while facing right and shooting, Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall.  Also used for falling out of crystal flash.

jump_left_aim_diag_down_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming diagonally upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_left_aim_diag_down.description: When Samus jumps and shoots diagonally downwards

jump_left_aim_diag_down_land.description: while facing left and aiming diagonally downwards (or downwards), Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_right_aim_diag_down_begin.description: As Samus begins to jump while aiming diagonally upwards, she bends her knees to push off of the ground

jump_right_aim_diag_down.description: When Samus jumps and shoots diagonally downwards

jump_right_aim_diag_down_land.description: while facing right and aiming diagonally downwards (or downwards), Samus makes contact with the ground after a jump or a fall

jump_left_aim_down.description: When Samus jumps and shoots downwards

jump_right_aim_down.description: When Samus jumps and shoots downwards

jump_turn_left.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

jump_turn_neutral.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

jump_turn_right.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

jump_turn_left_aim_up.description: While jumping and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

jump_turn_neutral_aim_up.description: While jumping and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

jump_turn_right_aim_up.description: While jumping and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

jump_turn_left_aim_down.description: While jumping and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

jump_turn_neutral_aim_down.description: While jumping and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

jump_turn_right_aim_down.description: While jumping and aiming down (or diag down), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

fall_left.description: When Samus walks off of a ledge, or if she unmorphs in midair, or if she is falling after being hurt.  At first goes through poses 0-2 but after a long fall transitions to the remaining poses

fall_right.description: When Samus walks off of a ledge, or if she unmorphs in midair, or if she is falling after being hurt.  At first goes through poses 0-2 but after a long fall transitions to the remaining poses

fall_left_aim_up.description: When Samus falls and shoots upwards

fall_right_aim_up.description: When Samus falls and shoots upwards

fall_left_aim_diag_up.description: When Samus falls and shoots diagonally upwards

fall_right_aim_diag_up.description: When Samus falls and shoots diagonally upwards

fall_left_shoot.description: When Samus walks off of a ledge, or if she unmorphs in midair, or if she is falling after being hurt AND is shooting.  At first goes through poses 0-2 but after a long fall transitions to the remaining poses

fall_right_shoot.description: When Samus walks off of a ledge, or if she unmorphs in midair, or if she is falling after being hurt AND is shooting.  At first goes through poses 0-2 but after a long fall transitions to the remaining poses

fall_left_aim_diag_down.description: When Samus falls and shoots diagonally downwards

fall_right_aim_diag_down.description: When Samus falls and shoots diagonally downwards

fall_left_aim_down.description: When Samus falls and shoots downwards

fall_right_aim_down.description: When Samus falls and shoots downwards

roll_out_left.description: Samus is damage boosting.  She faces right but because of damage she jumps to the left and rolls out.

roll_out_right.description: Samus is damage boosting.  She faces left but because of damage she jumps to the right and rolls out.

morph_left.description: When Samus is transitioning to or from the morphball, and when she converts between morphball and crystal flash

morph_left1.description: When Samus is transitioning to or from the morphball, and when she converts between morphball and crystal flash

morph_right.description: When Samus is transitioning to or from the morphball, and when she converts between morphball and crystal flash

morph_right1.description: When Samus is transitioning to or from the morphball, and when she converts between morphball and crystal flash

bonk_left.description: Samus is facing left and takes damage but does not boost.  This pose is also held for a long time leading up to the death animation.

bonk_left1.description: Samus is facing left and takes damage but does not boost.  This pose is also held for a long time leading up to the death animation.

bonk_right.description: Samus is facing right and takes damage but does not boost.  This pose is also held for a long time leading up to the death animation.

bonk_right1.description: Samus is facing right and takes damage but does not boost.  This pose is also held for a long time leading up to the death animation.

crouch_left_aim_up.description: Samus is crouching and aims straight up

crouch_left_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is crouching and aims diagonally up, or is lifting the cannon to aim directly up

crouch_left_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is crouching and aims diagonally down

crouch_right_aim_up.description: Samus is crouching and aims straight up

crouch_right_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is crouching and aims diagonally up, or is lifting the cannon to aim directly up

crouch_right_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is crouching and aims diagonally down

sparks_left.description: When using screw attack, a halo of sparks surrounds Samus, and pulses every few frames

sparks_right.description: When using screw attack, a halo of sparks surrounds Samus, and pulses every few frames

fall_turn_left.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

fall_turn_neutral.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

fall_turn_right.description: While jumping, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

fall_turn_left_aim_up.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

fall_turn_neutral_aim_up.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

fall_turn_right_aim_up.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

fall_turn_left_aim_down.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more left'

fall_turn_neutral_aim_down.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'forward'

fall_turn_right_aim_down.description: While falling and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_left_aim_up.description: While crouching and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_neutral_aim_up.description: While crouching and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_right_aim_up.description: While crouching and aiming up (or diag up), Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_left_aim_down.description: While crouching and aiming diagonally down, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_neutral_aim_down.description: While crouching and aiming diagonally down, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

crouch_turn_right_aim_down.description: While crouching and aiming diagonally down, Samus is turning from right to left, or left to right, and is presently facing 'more right'

grabbed_left_aim_diag_up.description: Caught by Draygon and aiming diagonally upwards

grabbed_left_shoot.description: Caught by Draygon and firing forwards

grabbed_left_aim_diag_down.description: Caught by Draygon and aiming diagonally downwards

grabbed_left_struggling.description: Caught by Draygon and trying to get away by moving the D-pad

grabbed_right_aim_diag_up.description: Caught by Draygon and aiming diagonally upwards

grabbed_right_shoot.description: Caught by Draygon and firing forwards

grabbed_right_aim_diag_down.description: Caught by Draygon and aiming diagonally downwards

grabbed_right_struggling.description: Caught by Draygon and trying to get away by moving the D-pad

crouch_transition_left.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa

crouch_transition_left_aim_up.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming upwards

crouch_transition_left_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming diagonally upwards

crouch_transition_left_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming diagonally downwards

crouch_transition_right.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa

crouch_transition_right_aim_up.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming upwards

crouch_transition_right_aim_diag_up.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming diagonally upwards

crouch_transition_right_aim_diag_down.description: Samus is transitioning from crouching to standing, or vice versa, while aiming diagonally downwards

shine_spark_left.description: Samus is shinesparking (i.e. super jumping) either laterally or diagonally

shine_spark_right.description: Samus is shinesparking (i.e. super jumping) either laterally or diagonally

shine_spark_vertical_left.description: Samus is shinesparking (i.e. super jumping) vertically while facing left

shine_spark_vertical_right.description: Samus is shinesparking (i.e. super jumping) vertically while facing right

crystal_flash_left.description: The floating silhouette inside of the crystal flash bubble

crystal_flash_right.description: The floating silhouette inside of the crystal flash bubble

crystal_bubble_left_large.description: The pulsating bubble around crystal flash.  This is duplicated thrice to complete a full circle

crystal_bubble_right_large.description: The pulsating bubble around crystal flash.  This is duplicated thrice to complete a full circle

grapple_clockwise.description: While swinging forward/clockwise or backwards/counterclockwise (i.e. facing 'left'), the game chooses choose an appropriate angle subject to an 11.25 degree arc.  Upside-down poses are mirrored

grapple_clockwise_pulled_in.description: When Samus is begin pulled upward by the grapple but is not swinging

grapple_clockwise_hanging.description: When Samus is hanging from the grapple and not swinging

grapple_counterclockwise.description: While swinging forward/counterclockwise or backwards/clockwise (i.e. facing 'right'), the game chooses choose an appropriate angle subject to an 11.25 degree arc.  Upside-down poses are mirrored

grapple_counterclockwise_pulled_in.description: When Samus is begin pulled upward by the grapple but is not swinging

grapple_counterclockwise_hanging.description: When Samus is hanging from the grapple and not swinging

supplication_left.description: Samus is paralyzed/exhuasted/drained during the Metroid or Mother Brain sequences.  The first of these poses is held still for a short while while Samus gains hyper beam.

supplication_look_up_left.description: Samus is drained, but looks up to watch a storyline sequence

supplication_right.description: Samus is paralyzed/exhuasted/drained during the Metroid or Mother Brain sequences

supplication_look_up_right.description: Samus is drained, but looks up to watch a storyline sequence

supplication_left_collapse.description: After taking a rainbow beam to the face, this pose is used when Samus makes contact with the ground, before collapsing

supplication_left_stand_attempt.description: During the Mother Brain fight, while paralyzed, Samus makes several attempts to stand up

death_left.description: Samus's body emerging from the broken suit during the death sequence

death_left_pieces.description: Samus's suit pieces exploding during the death sequence

death_right.description: Samus's body emerging from the broken suit during the death sequence

death_right_pieces.description: Samus's suit pieces exploding during the death sequence

file_select_head.description: Classically, these are three heads that turn to face the camera when the save file is selected

file_select_visor.description: Classically, there is a flash that goes across Samus's front-facing visor after the save file is selected

file_select_cursor_array.description: Classically, the cursor is constructed by rotating upwards through the list of missile bases, and the light on the tip moves up and down as 12321

file_select_piping.description: This piping is used to construct the frame around SAMUS DATA in the menu

gun_port00.description: These ports are superimposed over the cannon to simulate the cannon opening.  They progress in a fast sequence to give the illusion that the cannon is opening/closing in real-time.

palette_block.description: The rows are (top to bottom): power, varia, gravity, death, file select, and then one row with flash bubble colors, visor xray colors, then ship colors
